name: Blokcbuster Rush
description:
Play as a Blokcbuster employee (definitely not Blockbuster) with a useless coworker/manager. You must rewind all tapes that customers return and put them in the correct spot in the shelves.

CONTROLS:

Wait for customer to come to return line and press "E" to take the VHS from them.

Walk up to a rewinder and press "E" to set the VHS in the rewinder.

Press "E" to take the rewound tape from rewinder and put it in the flashing slot in an isle.

Avoid contact with Bob and customers or you will get penalized!
